name: School For SHMUPs (Chapter ONE)
description:
Chapter 1 of the long anticipated [citation needed] visual novel 'A School for SHMUPs' is now available after five years of tormented and delayed development.

When a human boy is admitted to a prestigious school that is otherwise exclusively for SHMUPs, he must learn to cope with a shift in his reality. SHMUPs are real, they have wants, needs, emotions and goals. They're just like you and me! What awaits in your first year at Shmuppington Academy? 

A tale as old as time, this is just the first exciting chapter of this story. Will there be a chapter two? Lets be honest, probably not, that's what happens when a developer underestimates the effort in making a visual novel. And, in this case, a visual novel with fully 3D characters, animations, 3D backgrounds, branching story and choices that stay with you to the end of the game.

Please enjoy this terrible tale of cosmic horror, murder, friendship, love and schoolwork.

Feel free to send me your thoughts @thos_thom
